Title: Establishes a co-navigation services program for persons who are deaf-blind
Summary: Establishes a co-navigation services program for persons who are deaf-blind to provide services to a person who is deaf-blind that assist the person to physically access the person's environment and to make informed decisions, including providing visual and environmental information or sighted guide services and assisting with communication accessibility by communicating in the preferred language and communication mode of the person who is deaf-blind.
LawCode: Add ยง152-e, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to establishing a co-navigation services program for persons who are deaf-blind
